description: A joke about Frankenstein misunderstanding a bodybuilding competition.
title: Bodybuilding Misunderstood
n_1: Frankenstein walked into the bodybuilding competition confidently.
c2_1: Uh, sir, this is a different kind of bodybuilding.
n_2: Frankenstein looked confused as he noticed the other competitors.
c2_2: It's about building muscle, not assembling bodies.
n_3: The judge sighed while Frankenstein scratched his head.
c1_3: I guess I really misunderstood this.
n_4: Frankenstein left the stage, still puzzled.
c1_4: Maybe I should stick to my lab.
